verses.name: Genesis 4:1
verses.text: And Adam knew Eve his wife; and she conceived, and bare Cain, and said, I have gotten a man from the Lord.

verses.name: Genesis 4:2
verses.text: And she again bare his brother Abel. And Abel was a keeper of sheep, but Cain was a tiller of the ground.

verses.name: Genesis 4:3
verses.text: And in process of time it came to pass, that Cain brought of the fruit of the ground an offering unto the Lord.

verses.name: Genesis 4:4
verses.text: And Abel, he also brought of the firstlings of his flock and of the fat thereof. And the Lord had respect unto Abel and to his offering:
